ResearchProjectDef.label: occupational clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sew further complicated garments for common occupations such as detectives, police, nurses, and fishermen. [From Call of Cthulhu - Neutral Factions Mod]

ResearchProjectDef.label: riot combat gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of advance threat disabling combat gear. [From Call of Cthulhu - Neutral Factions Mod]
